Name: Bow & Crystal Tower Defense
About the game: Protect the magic crystal from hordes of skeletons. You can control the archer using the WASD keys and the mouse. Aim at the skeletons by holding down the left mouse button and shoot. Your task is to prevent skeletons from reaching the crystal. Holding out for as long as possible. You can also shoot barrels that will explode destroying skeletons.
